title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Waverley Station was closed, so they couldn't cut through. Instead, they headed down Calton Road then up New Street. Halfway up the road there was a turn-off into a derelict car park.

title: Trainspotting
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: THE TOON SEEMS sinister and alien as ah pad it doon fae the Waverley. Two guys are screaming at each other under the archway in Calton Road, by the Post Office depot. Either that, or the cunts are screaming at me.
